pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, March 2, 2016:

Vancouver

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will speak at the GLOBE Leadership Summit.

Vancouver Convention Centre
East Building, Ballrooms ABC
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will host a media availability.

Vancouver Convention Centre
East Building, Room 13
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, BC

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Indigenous leaders.

Vancouver Convention Centre
West Building, Room 301
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, BC

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
